12211.content:
Here's some character options to get you started on this path.

Jade Brooks is a twenty one year old that has spent the last three years tracking down a mythical ring said to bless the wearer with a magical pregnancy, and she has finally found it.

Sarah Ross is a twenty three year old anthro cow. She has recently come across a spell book containing a spell that might just fulfill her dream of feeling her body fill with life.

Will go you go with either of these starting points, or continue on and try something else?
12211.title: Willing magical pregnancies

choices: Sarah doesn’t look or feel any different, was something wrong with the spell?
She is definitely pregnant now with a belly rising high above her prone body.
The spell might have worked too well; she is pinned by her enormous form.
122112.content:
Sarah quietly muttered to herself, running a long slender finger down the faded text. She came across this worn old tome by pure chance, hidden away in the back of a rundown curio store. The book was almost entirely hidden behind layers of cobwebs and dust, but a loose floorboard meant that the young cow woman heard the book shifting slightly when she walked past.

Several weeks had passed since she found the thing, and she had tried out some of the other simpler spells laid out. It started out as just a joke, but after briefly turning her hair into cotton candy, she realized what she now possessed.

Then she found the spell tucked away in the middle of the book. Deciphering the faded text was tricky, but what she could make out made her giddy as a schoolgirl. Ever since she first saw her mother carrying the twins, Sarah had been enraptured with the idea of pregnancy. Throughout her childhood, she would often stuff pillows into her shirt, nightdress, whatever in order to get close to the feeling. She even still did that now, but with far larger pillows in order to make herself look even more fecund. But now, she could maybe have it for real.

One last time, she went down the ingredient list and reviewed the directions. This wasn’t something she wanted to make a mistake on. Shrugging off her robe, Sarah briefly ran her fingers through her fur, feeling the chilled air already starting to settle against her skin. She next checked to make sure that the chalk circle was properly formed, along with the symbols she had to draw around the edge. Lighting the candles, she also placed them and the other required ingredients in their respective places around the circle.

Checking the ritual circle against the book again, the cow nodded. She was practically shivering in anticipation as she applied the balm to her stomach. A small shiver did travel up her back as she felt the fragrant oil seeping through her fur and causing her skin to tingle. After flicking the overhead light off so there was only a dim glow coming from the candles, she stepped into the circle and lay down in the middle. The faint smell of strawberries from the balm wafted around, tickling her nose as she started to recite the incantation.

The first few passes were slow and choppy, but she was still being cautious. On the fourth loop, she thought she saw the candle flames jump slightly and felt a warmth bloom in her torso. The flames wavered even more noticeably on the fifth pass, and the warmth grew to spread throughout her body, accompanied by a tickle deep within her stomach. Partway through the sixth pass, Sarah saw a trail of flame leap from candle to candle, forming a circle of fire that mirrored the chalk circle on the floor. Strange bluish smoke poured up and out of the bowls around her, the streams merging into a tight little cloud directly over the cow, churning about and lit from within by a pale glow. Sarah almost faltered as she saw this, but forced her voice to keep steady and continue on. As she reached the end of the seventh and final pass, the flames flared bright enough to light up the rest of the room, while the smoky cloud shot out a tendril that passed straight into her stomach. The warmth that had been building turned into a feeling of almost being on fire, but there was no pain to go with it; even her fingers and toes tingled from whatever it was.

When the last of the smoke vanished into her body, the candles and the circle of flame all went out at once, plunging the room into darkness. Lying still, Sarah could barely even hear herself panting over her heartbeat pounding in her ears. The candles slowly started to glow again, the dim light revealing her body and what the spell had done.
122112.title: The dream spell

12213.content:

The implants were optional but she just couldn't resist. She was by no means interested in sexual behavior but she always had an interest in pregnancy without sex. No one was home besides herself - she was an orphan child and lived alone by preference in her mid-orbit home overlooking a giant inhabitable planet.

With her curiosity at an all time high and with the tech capable of getting her pregnant she walked outside and sat on the ground. She was at the spot where she wanted to test out the new capability and her fertility.
